dict.acceptation: 包含，包括；由…组成；由…构成；

sent.orig: It can comprise of diversified materials including coating, structural absorbing material, conventional composite, and metal etc.
sent.trans: 组成它的材料可以有很多种，如结构型吸波材料、吸波涂料、普通复合材料和金属材料等。

sent.orig: The jumping and throwing contests comprise the field events.
sent.trans: 田赛项目有跳跃和投掷。

sent.orig: In fact, marketing, promotions and advertising companies comprise about 95 percent of the company's business.
sent.trans: 事实上，市场营销、促销及广告公司等带来了约95％的业务。

sent.orig: Industrial unions generally comprise a number of diverse groups.
sent.trans: 产业工会一般由许多各种各样的集团组成。
